passive.name: Rebirth
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When an enemy target's Weakness gets broken, there is a {{2, percent}}% base chance to inflict the "Charring" state on it, which increases its Break DMG taken by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{4}} turn(s). This effect can stack {{5}} time(s).
